Articles.Content:
Oh, I do. But I wish there were a Spore game kerbal-themed. Hum... a good wish for a game I've been playing somewhere...

The user below me played/plays D&D. The actual, paper-made D&D

I've actually played it, but only four or five times.

The user below me is bald.

False

The user below me has been on the KSP forum.

I rarely leave the forum games, but yes.

The user below me is eating.

False. Ate a few hours ago.

The user below me is a nuclear warhead.

False.

The user below me studied/currently is studying in a form of art/media.

True. I'm trying to teach myself 3d modelling. Will try to make some mod parts or some fan art of KSP when I figure out how to make Blender work the way I want.

The user below me doesn't live in Europe.

True. I'm a true 'Murican.

The user below me has lived in South America.

False.

The user below me is a pet pillow.

Whit love and care....... and a brutal kick whit a bat i could (Because im a seal!).

The user below me owns a can of beans

Nope. I don't want wind

The user below me has 4+ copies of KSP

Um... no. Only one.

The user below has more posts than the user above me.

yes i most definitely do

the user below me has more posts than i do

Maybe... I don't know... since posts in the game forum don't count, I would say no.

The user below me knows what is terribly wrong with the N64 controler.

That weird third analog stick.

The user below me speaks two languages.

Trudad, hablo Espanol y Ingles.

The user below me is fluent in the Japanese language.

Nope, but I talk fluent in French.

Vous voyez? C'est tellement facile, mÃƒÂªme les poulpe tel que moi en sont capable.

The user below me have no idea of what I'm talking about without using Google Translate or else.

Edited May 2, 2014 by mrrpamplemousse

False. Despite the fact that I don't speak french, most latin languages have so much in common that if you're watchful, you can catch something.

The user below me believe brazilians do speak spanish.

No. I will admit, I didn't know that until last week.

The user below me is a certified genius.

Nope. I'm a certified rocket crasher.

The user below me is a pie.

Just because someone is round doesn't mean he/she's a pie.

The user below me is round.

No. I will admit, I didn't know that until last week.

That's the plot twist: they don't. The Brazillians speak Portuguese.

False

The user below me has the technology.

No. I will admit, I didn't know that until last week.

That's the plot twist: they don't. The Brazillians speak Portuguese.

True, I have the technology to play forum games.

The user below me is currently [at the time he/she/it visualises this] upside down.

I do, surprisingly!

Also, the user below me is a pessimist about Skylon.

False. I don't even know what Skylon is, so I don't have an opinion about it.

The user below me is not european.
